imdb.title: Warau Salesman NEW
imdb.plot: Each episode follows Fukuzou Moguro, a traveling salesman, and his current customer. Moguro deals in things that give his customers their heart's desire, and once his deals are made and their unhealthy desires are satisfied, Mogur...

episodes.title: Daydream/Make a Budget and Stick to it
episodes.plot: Nakajima Kenichi is introduced to a hidden club by his workmates and spends more time there, which makes him and his friend risk their jobs. Takashima Mitsuko is given a card that will repossess the things she buys the next day.

episodes.title: Hot Springs Eccentricity/Fantasy Company
episodes.plot: Mature company man Kihara Shisao with a liking for hot springs is encouraged by Moguro to indulge his passion. Young employee Deyashiro Iyata quits his job after being abused by his boss, Moguro introduces him to a Fantasy Company where people change roles each day.

episodes.title: Bento Wars/Ah, My Beloved 583-type
episodes.plot: Amae Masao is forced to choose between his girlfriend and mother's bentos. Kamera Tetsuya is a train fanatic but his sales estimates are poor, Moguro gives him a ticket to ride his favorite train.

episodes.title: The Woman on the Platform/Runner's Paradise
episodes.plot: Moguro helps a young banker Naoki Junichi arrange a meeting with a girl he sees on his train to work. Michihara Kakeru runs to relieve stress, but is continually frustrated by obstacles and pedestrians and is given a runners' pass.

episodes.title: Sunday Club/The Woman Who Throws Away
episodes.plot: Old salary man Uchinaki Yousuke is tired of his boring days, so he's introduced to a club where everyday feels like a Sunday. Housewife Monomochi Tomie has a home full of clutter from her husband and son, Moguro helps her to start tidying.

episodes.title: I'll Lease This Monster/Tonight's Another Awesome Night
episodes.plot: Huge actor Udo Taizou has trouble getting work, Moguro provides a mask so that he can get work in monster roles. Night-owl college student Doraki Tomoyoshi gets a sleeping potion from Moguro so he can enjoy the daytime with his girlfriend.

episodes.title: The Man Who Transformed/The Rule of Mommy Friends
episodes.plot: Moguro encourages part-time dad Isobe Kinichi to wear a disguise to have fun nights out on the town. Housewife and part-time worker Shizuoka Nozomi is unhappy about a domineering head of her mothers' group in her apartment building.

episodes.title: A Man Chased By His Dreams/Mustache Taxi
episodes.plot: Scriptwriter Yumemi Ashi has nightmares of being chased, so Moguro gives him some Pleasant Dreams Candy. Taxi driver Yowagoshi Sugiru has difficulty with troublesome customers, Moguro gives him a mustache to make him look less timid.

episodes.title: The Nostalgic Bathhouse Tour/The Researcher's Melancholy
episodes.plot:
